actions: Guide the user to their account for refund initiation
user_question: There was a mistake with my order. Can I get a refund, and how can I request for it?
system_answer: Yes, you can request a refund for your order. To initiate the refund process, please go to your account on our website under 'Order History' or contact our support team for assistance.

actions: Provide instructions for resetting the password

user_question: Is there a way for me to reset my password?
system_answer: Yes, you can reset your password by clicking on 'Log In' and then the 'Forgot Password?' link. Enter your email address, and we will send you a link to create a new password.
